item.title: Who’s Big Amy? – 11/9/15
item.dc:creator: carlito
item.description: It’s time for more daytime help wanted calls! Big Amy has had enough of Carlito calling her every time we do one of these. Social engineering your way into getting a hiring manager on the line is not the best way to go about looking for a job. Carlito gets around a court order to […]
item.content:encoded: It’s time for more daytime help wanted calls! Big Amy has had enough of Carlito calling her every time we do one of these. Social engineering your way into getting a hiring manager on the line is not the best way to go about looking for a job. Carlito gets around a court order to not yell at his wife by insulting her through a PA system. An Indian man claims to be walking down the street to talk to a police officer. You gotta season your lead before building with it. Matt Hillock and Zax are guests.
item.itunes:subtitle: It’s time for more daytime help wanted calls! Big Amy has had enough of Carlito calling her every time we do one of these. Social engineering your way into getting a hiring manager on the line is not the best way to go about looking for a job.[...]

Carlito gets around a court order to not yell at his wife by insulting her through a PA system. An Indian man claims to be walking down the street to talk to a police officer. You gotta season your lead before building with it. Matt Hillock and Zax are guests.

item.title: Milkman’s Last Birthday – 10/31/2015
item.dc:creator: carlito
item.description: It’s Halloween AND Milkman’s birthday machine! How blessed are the appliances for sale? Carlito calls a news tip line and recites the entire plot of The Shining. We call several people with costumes, baby gates and dollies for sale. Steak and Shake orders. Carlito insults Jehovah’s Witnesses fro not giving out candy to trick or […]
item.content:encoded:
It’s Halloween AND Milkman’s birthday machine!  How blessed are the appliances for sale?  Carlito calls a news tip line and recites the entire plot of The Shining.  We call several people with costumes, baby gates and dollies for sale.  Steak and Shake orders.  Carlito insults Jehovah’s Witnesses fro not giving out candy to trick or treaters.

 

YouTube video with the best pranks from this week’s show: Subscribe to Prank Calls of the Week!
item.itunes:subtitle: It’s Halloween AND Milkman’s birthday machine! How blessed are the appliances for sale? Carlito calls a news tip line and recites the entire plot of The Shining. We call several people with costumes, baby gates and dollies for sale. [...]
item.itunes:summary:
It’s Halloween AND Milkman’s birthday machine! How blessed are the appliances for sale? Carlito calls a news tip line and recites the entire plot of The Shining. We call several people with costumes, baby gates and dollies for sale. Steak and Shake orders. Carlito insults Jehovah’s Witnesses fro not giving out candy to trick or treaters.
YouTube video with the best pranks from this week’s show: Subscribe to Prank Calls of the Week!
item.itunes:keywords: Prank, Crank, Phone, Calls, Comedy, Pranks, Madhouse, Radio
item.itunes:author: Big Carlito

item.title: R.I.P. Daily Double – 10/25/2015
item.dc:creator: carlito
item.description: Carlito keeps cracking up during his calls. Milkman is lamenting the end of his favorite McDonalds menu item: the Daily Double. Carlito calls around trying to find an alternative option from McDonald’s as well as competitive bids from Burger King and Wendys. We have some fun at the expense of a few infomercial order lines. […]
item.content:encoded:
Carlito keeps cracking up during his calls.  Milkman is lamenting the end of his favorite McDonalds menu item: the Daily Double.  Carlito calls around trying to find an alternative option from McDonald’s as well as competitive bids from Burger King and Wendys.  We have some fun at the expense of a few infomercial order lines.  Job searching in Hawaii and offering to cut down someone’s free coconut tree.  Another pissed off swap shop poster is meeting Carlito at the Walmart looking for his silver Prius after an argument regarding a satanic Elmo bed.

Get just the best prank calls from tonight’s episode on Prank Calls of the Week! on YouTube:  https://youtu.be/t7v6ZfI1-  While you are there help out by hitting Like and Subscribe!
item.itunes:subtitle: Carlito keeps cracking up during his calls. Milkman is lamenting the end of his favorite McDonalds menu item: the Daily Double. Carlito calls around trying to find an alternative option from McDonald’s as well as competitive bids from Burge[...]
item.itunes:summary: Carlito keeps cracking up during his calls. Milkman is lamenting the end of his favorite McDonalds menu item: the Daily Double. Carlito calls around trying to find an alternative option from McDonald’s as well as competitive bids from Burger King and Wendys. We have some fun at the expense of a few infomercial order lines. Job searching in Hawaii and offering to cut down someone’s free coconut tree. Another pissed off swap shop poster is meeting Carlito at the Walmart looking for his silver Prius after an argument regarding a satanic Elmo bed. Get just the best prank calls from tonight’s episode on Prank Calls of the Week! on YouTube: https://youtu.be/t7v6ZfI1- While you are there help out by hitting Like and Subscribe!

item.title: Fuzzy Marketing – 10/18/2015
item.dc:creator: carlito
item.description: A lady at Home Depot rats us out while calling our friend at Lowe’s. A different lady jumps at the chance to insult us after an inappropriate question regarding her clarinet. Carlito confronts a guy selling empty Dan Aykroyd Crystal Head Vodka skull bottles as expensive Halloween decorations. Some new Planet Fitness lunk alarm calls […]
item.content:encoded: A lady at Home Depot rats us out while calling our friend at Lowe’s.  A different lady jumps at the chance to insult us after an inappropriate question regarding her clarinet.  Carlito confronts a guy selling empty Dan Aykroyd Crystal Head Vodka skull bottles as expensive Halloween decorations.  Some new Planet Fitness lunk alarm calls (including a hold fail).

item.title: Dropping Loads – 10/11/2015
item.dc:creator: carlito
item.description: Ordering a salad bar to go from Sizzler consisting of several large boxes of salad mix and several chopped onions. Also ordering the Chinese buffet to go. Carlito is trying to make a prank call about the Black Whopper but can’t get a Burger King to answer the phone. Local man wants us to drop […]
item.content:encoded: Ordering a salad bar to go from Sizzler consisting of several large boxes of salad mix and several chopped onions.  Also ordering the Chinese buffet to go.  Carlito is trying to make a prank call about the Black Whopper but can’t get a Burger King to answer the phone.  Local man wants us to drop six loads on his daughter.  More Twitter complainers.
item.itunes:subtitle: Ordering a salad bar to go from Sizzler consisting of several large boxes of salad mix and several chopped onions. Also ordering the Chinese buffet to go. Carlito is trying to make a prank call about the Black Whopper but can’t get a Burger King t[...]
item.itunes:summary: Ordering a salad bar to go from Sizzler consisting of several large boxes of salad mix and several chopped onions. Also ordering the Chinese buffet to go. Carlito is trying to make a prank call about the Black Whopper but can’t get a Burger King to answer the phone. Local man wants us to drop six loads on his daughter. More Twitter complainers.
item.itunes:keywords: Prank, Crank, Phone, Calls, Comedy, Pranks, Madhouse, Radio

item.title: You Are An Asshole – 10/4/2015
item.dc:creator: carlito
item.description: Looking to get the specs on some after-market horseshoes. We discuss the origin of the term “pair of pants”. Benedict Cumberbatch is researching a movie role, has the owner of a moving company meet him at a bar. Carlito is denied the secret of how McDonalds makes so many perfectly round eggs. We want to […]
item.content:encoded: Looking to get the specs on some after-market horseshoes.  We discuss the origin of the term “pair of pants”.  Benedict Cumberbatch is researching a movie role, has the owner of a moving company meet him at a bar.  Carlito is denied the secret of how McDonalds makes so many perfectly round eggs.  We want to install a turkey in the middle of a table.  A handful of very funny Twitter complainers.
item.itunes:subtitle: Looking to get the specs on some after-market horseshoes. We discuss the origin of the term “pair of pants”. Benedict Cumberbatch is researching a movie role, has the owner of a moving company meet him at a bar. Carlito is denied the [...]
item.itunes:summary: Looking to get the specs on some after-market horseshoes. We discuss the origin of the term “pair of pants”. Benedict Cumberbatch is researching a movie role, has the owner of a moving company meet him at a bar. Carlito is denied the secret of how McDonalds makes so many perfectly round eggs. We want to install a turkey in the middle of a table. A handful of very funny Twitter complainers.
item.itunes:keywords: Prank, Crank, Phone, Calls, Comedy, Pranks, Madhouse, Radio

item.dc:creator: carlito
item.description: Bayou man is looking for a room to rent – wants to take out the built in furniture for a discount. Dr. Cross, an animal expert for CNBC Radio, is producing a segment on aggressiveness in puppies who aren’t weaned properly. Black Adopting a black cat machine for a black pagan mass. Getting a sexual […]
item.content:encoded: Bayou man is looking for a room to rent – wants to take out the built in furniture for a discount.  Dr. Cross, an animal expert for CNBC Radio, is producing a segment on aggressiveness in puppies who aren’t weaned properly.  Black Adopting a black cat machine for a black pagan mass.  Getting a sexual thrill from hunting deer.  What do you mean by ‘Do what now’?  A man gets upset when Carlito starts playing Counting.

Dr. Cross, an animal expert for CNBC Radio, is producing a segment on aggressiveness in puppies who aren’t weaned properly. Black Adopting a black cat machine for a black pagan mass. item.title: Where You At? – 9/6/2015
item.dc:creator: carlito
item.description: Carlito is looking for some shutters for his fucking hole in the woods – can’t do the math to figure out the price. We send a guy to a Walmart parking lot to meet us for a job, he spends the next half hour looking for Carlito to beat his ass up for wasting his […]
item.content:encoded: Carlito is looking for some shutters for his fucking hole in the woods – can’t do the math to figure out the price.  We send a guy to a Walmart parking lot to meet us for a job, he spends the next half hour looking for Carlito to beat his ass up for wasting his gas.  Tying horses to the bumper of a Ford F100 by their legs and driving off.  Carlito knows how to “have fun” during has calls.

item.dc:creator: carlito
item.description: Waking up are waking up Patel wankers. Jin wants to buy a carousel horse with a hole in it for his fist. We are calling Audi asking for the best way to steal one o ftheir cars. Later on they are seeking roadside assistance after experiencing a combined robbery/car jacking/assault/mouth-rape incident with a member of […]
item.content:encoded: Waking up are waking up Patel wankers.  Jin wants to buy a carousel horse with a hole in it for his fist.  We are calling Audi asking for the best way to steal one o ftheir cars.  Later on they are seeking roadside assistance after experiencing a combined robbery/car jacking/assault/mouth-rape incident with a member of America’s favorite ethnic class!  Artie’s whore’s car catches on fire.

item.description: Messing around with pizza orders, offending foreigners at work & explaining the black problem. Carlito is getting upset again when he finds out a car has already been sold. Stuck in the elevator in Puerto Rico with a violent chicken. The computer is not going. Dwight calls back a dude with a lost wallet.

item.title: Shit Water – 7/26/2015
item.dc:creator: carlito
item.description: Carlito has water coming out of his ass after eating bad food, he calls around looking for a pair of shorts and medical advice – HIPAA compliance is broken in the process. We try to convince Dadead to let us hear him have sex with his wife. General Awesome is confusing Jin Stewart & Dadead […]
item.content:encoded: Carlito has water coming out of his ass after eating bad food, he calls around looking for a pair of shorts and medical advice – HIPAA compliance is broken in the process.  We try to convince Dadead to let us hear him have sex with his wife.  General Awesome is confusing Jin Stewart & Dadead with his audio machines.  A Comcast complainer is bothered with the fact that his social media accounts are being monitored.

item.title: Language! – 6/26/2015
item.dc:creator: carlito
item.description: Carlito is wasting restaurant’s time with long food orders. Dwight gets another 7-11 clerk to make a Diet Coke/Mentos geyser. Llama is starting shit at the Huddle House. We call a very angry Vietnamese restaurant in Guam. Carlito leaves a hotel attendant “out of sorts” and offended. Carlito, Dwight, Brad & Neon all prank a […]
item.content:encoded: Carlito is wasting restaurant’s time with long food orders. Dwight gets another 7-11 clerk to make a Diet Coke/Mentos geyser. Llama is starting shit at the Huddle House. We call a very angry Vietnamese restaurant in Guam. Carlito leaves a hotel attendant “out of sorts” and offended. Carlito, Dwight, Brad & Neon all prank a Twitter complainer – turning a “standup comedian” into an asshole over “hop fees” in the process.

item.itunes:summary: Carlito is wasting restaurant’s time with long food orders. Dwight gets another 7-11 clerk to make a Diet Coke/Mentos geyser. Llama is starting shit at the Huddle House. We call a very angry Vietnamese restaurant in Guam. Carlito leaves a hotel attendant “out of sorts” and offended. Carlito, Dwight, Brad & Neon all prank a Twitter complainer – turning a “standup comedian” into an asshole over “hop fees” in the process.
item.itunes:keywords: Prank, Crank, Phone, Calls, Comedy, Pranks, Madhouse, Radio
item.itunes:author: Big Carlito

item.title: Lost Prank Call: Racist Indian
item.dc:creator: carlito
item.description: A prank call from a summer 2012 episode where an Indian man goes aggro racist on Americans, explaining that we are all on food stamps and do nothing but eat potato chips, drink Diet Pepsi (or Diet Coke), sit on the couch & watch football. According to him foreigners are actually running the country.
item.content:encoded: A prank call from a summer 2012 episode where an Indian man goes aggro racist on Americans, explaining that we are all on food stamps and do nothing but eat potato chips, drink Diet Pepsi (or Diet Coke), sit on the couch & watch football.  According to him foreigners are actually running the country.

item.title: Lost Prank Call: Michelle Off Air
item.dc:creator: carlito
item.description: A previously unedited call to M1chille which was not included in the original episode where Carlito first called her. This call occurred after the end of the “Sexual Organs” episode. And includes Michelle talking about how she used to think she was a whore, why Carlito is scaring her & more.

item.title: Shishu – 6/21/2015
item.dc:creator: carlito
item.description: Jin is looking to donate a TV, but only after he pees on it. Carlito is looking to ‘borrow’ a vampire hunting kit from a Ripley’s Believe It Or Not Museum. Jin interrogates a Hugo Boss employee about the Nazi history of the company. Asian retail store workers are confused into looking for someone named […]
item.content:encoded: Jin is looking to donate a TV, but only after he pees on it.  Carlito is looking to ‘borrow’ a vampire hunting kit from a Ripley’s Believe It Or Not Museum.  Jin interrogates a Hugo Boss employee about the Nazi history of the company.  Asian retail store workers are confused into looking for someone named Shishu.  Carlito is almost able to convince a man to microwave his cordless phone.
item.itunes:subtitle: Jin is looking to donate a TV, but only after he pees on it. Carlito is looking to ‘borrow’ a vampire hunting kit from a Ripley’s Believe It Or Not Museum. Jin interrogates a Hugo Boss employee about the Nazi history of the compa[...]
item.itunes:summary: Jin is looking to donate a TV, but only after he pees on it. Carlito is looking to ‘borrow’ a vampire hunting kit from a Ripley’s Believe It Or Not Museum. Jin interrogates a Hugo Boss employee about the Nazi history of the company. Asian retail store workers are confused into looking for someone named Shishu. Carlito is almost able to convince a man to microwave his cordless phone.
item.itunes:keywords: Prank, Crank, Phone, Calls, Comedy, Pranks, Madhouse, Radio
